pasta.util

Class ProjectProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.util.ProjectProperties

  • @Component
public class ProjectProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    The project properties.

    Uses singleton pattern. Pretty self explanatory. It just holds all of the configuration that is used by the system.

    Since:
    2012-11-13
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • encryptAuthContent

        private void encryptAuthContent()
        Doesn't actually do any ecryption.

        This should be fixed, but I didn't have the time to do it. Doesn't actually hold anything sensitive, but it should still not be held as plain text.

      • decryptAuthContent

        private void decryptAuthContent()
        Doesn't actually do any decryption.

        This should be fixed, but I didn't have the time to do it. Doesn't actually hold anything sensitive, but it should still not be held as plain text.
